allow: Bash(docker exec myanime-postgres psql -U postgres -d myanime -c "SELECT al.id, al.""userId"", al.""animeId"", a.title FROM anime_lists al LEFT JOIN anime a ON al.""animeId"" = a.id WHERE a.id IS NULL;")
Bash(docker exec myanime-postgres psql -U postgres -d myanime -c "SELECT a.id, a.title, a.""coverImage"" FROM anime a INNER JOIN anime_lists al ON a.id = al.""animeId"" LIMIT 10;")
